short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension that changes images of President Putin to that of the 'we're all trying to find the guy who did this'-meme

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser extension that changes images of President Putin to that of the 'we're all trying to find the guy who did this'-meme.
it uses the information provided by a correctly formatted image to make the change, this isn't fool proof but works most of the time (depending on the website).
